articles.author: William Walker
articles.title: Covid travel tests branded 'rip off' and up to five times cost of return trip to Europe - The Mirror
articles.description: International travellers entering the UK must currently pay for a PCR test on or before the second day. These typically cost about £50, but some are priced at more than £100, while flights can go for as little as £18
articles.content:
Covid testing kits for travellers can cost holidaymakers up to five times the price of a return flight to Europe.
One MP called the extra costs for tourists 'a rip-off' and said the fees were puttin… [+3771 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Morrison
articles.title: European Space Agency's Solar Orbiter completes its second flyby of Venus - Daily Mail
articles.description: Solar Orbiter is on its way to study the polar regions of the sun in a bid to better understand its 11-year cycle and made its close approach at 05:42 BST, according to the European Space Agency.
articles.content:
The European Space Agency's Solar Orbiter spacecraft has made its second flyby of Venus, just 33 hours before the BepiColombo craft makes its close approach.
